name: Cowboy Love is Pure 1-002: You are having Deep Thoughts
description: Chapter 1, panel 2. Here we see a cowboy and a guide, contemplating the exhausted fireplace. What would a cowboy be thinking in circumstances such as these? The barren rock, the fading light, a struggling creek. The canyon overlooks everything.  A comic by Little Old Man. This panel is an edition of 30.
